title: Challenge 1 - Guitar Tuning
instructions: Tune the lowest string to an E (octave 4)
Tune the next string to an A (octave 4)
Tune the next string to a D (octave 4)
Tune the next string to a G (octave 4)
Tune the next string to a B (octave 4)
Tune the highest string to an E (octave 5)

title: Challenge 2 - Matching Pitches
instructions: Pick a partner
Using the app, produce a C (octave 6). Have your partner try to find the pitch by ear on the guitar
Switch with your partner and repeat the above step
Pick any note on the guitar and have your partner match the pitch using the app
Switch with your partner and repeat the above step
Repeat the challenge with your partner until each of you have matched 3 unique notes by ear using the app and guitar

title: Challenge 3 - Simple Melodies
instructions: Pick a simple song/lullaby such as 'Happy Birthday' or 'Twinkle Twinkle'
Hum it out loud with a partner
Try to figure out the STARTING note by ear using either a guitar or the app
Once you've found the starting note, see how much of the rest of the song you can pluck out by ear

title: Challenge 4 - Call and Response
instructions: Play three notes in a row of your choice on the app, and have your partner try to play them back using the guitar
Switch with your partner and try again
Whoever has the guitar should pluck out any three notes in a row and the other should find them by ear on the app
Switch with your partner and try again
Take turns challenging each other to play different notes and play them back

title: Challenge 5 - Favorite Song
instructions: Find your favorite song on iTunes/Spotify/etc.
Play your favorite part/melody out loud from your phone speakers
Hum it out loud
Try to figure out the STARTING note by ear using either a guitar or the app
Once you've found the STARTING note, see if you can pluck the rest out by ear
